commit message: Printing levels on a big image added. Some stupid levels added
BackButton reaction added. Main/GameOver/Pause -> finish, Play -> Pause
Some unused png files deleted, some potential bug fixed
Pacman lifes rendering added to Game
Pressed state added to menus buttons
Bonuses(Abstract/Life) added. No more than 3 lifes draws now.
'controls' subdir added. Moved to controls: Control/RectButton/Label
Audio(Open SL ES) basic functionality added
Background music handling added(In MainMenu on/off checkbox).
Some Game & Pacman changes(Compute score/eaten food separately)
Score & lifes count output moved to GameMenu. music changed.

Level struct added. Records save added. Stack corruption on replay bug
fixed.

Statistics paradigm changed(Engine/Menu/Pacman). Records
saving/loading/output added
music files descriptors opening added(game/menu) lists

Basic realtime sounds(OpenSL ES BufferQueuePlayer) added. Tunes not good,
so they are off by default.
Sounds added(Made by Charlie) - get life/death/win/game over.
Brushes generation added. Activity onResume crash bug fixed.
MVP matrix moved from Engine to Art
Sounds on/off button added  to main menu.
Creating progams Engine -> Art; Some new textures added
Plume animation added(Pacman/Monsters). Textures set updated
Some strings deleted. Main menu 'Pacman' label deleted.
Pulse animation added(use it for life bonus)

Pacman iimortality on respawn added. LifeBonus size increased. GameMenu
life image changed
Sounds, music and icons changed. Some useless files removed
Label render bug fix. Main menu layout changed

Win/GameOever menu labels changed. App title changed. Score computing
alpgorithm changed.
Some logs and comment removed. Readme updated.
We can save/load C-style strings. Engine and Game save/loading added.
Actor full saving, Pacman full saving added
Template universal Counter added. It used in Stupid/Clever monsters
Clever/Stupid montsers full saving added. Bonus fake save/load funcs added.
Statistcs full saving on pause added.
Statistics restoration bug (no load level record) fixed
Launcher activity title changed to 'Pyroman: Jaws of fire'
Possible mem leak removed from Pacman
